articles.title: July inflation peaked at 7.44 percent, expected to come down says Finance Secretary: Exclusive - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Even as the finance ministry expects CPI numbers to cool down going ahead, the government will continue to take more steps to contain inflation but avoid any knee-jerk reactions, Somanathan told Moneycontrol in an interview.

Inflation in India has peaked after coming in at a 15-month high, and is expected to gradually come down, Finance Secretary TV Somanathan said.
